title: Retrieve a Foreign property Business Source Adjustable Summary  Response
description: RRetrieve a Foreign property Business Source Adjustable Summary  Response.

metadata.description: Object containing the identifying data for the business and associated information for the BSAS with this ID.

calculationId.description: The unique identifier of the summary calculation.

requestedDateTime.description: The date and time the summary calculation was originally requested, prior to any adjustments.

adjustedDateTime.description: The date and time this calculation was adjusted.

nino.description: National Insurance number, in the format AA999999A.

taxYear.description: The tax year the data applies to, for example, 2021-22. The start year and end year must not span two tax years. No gaps are allowed, for example, 2020-22 is not valid.

summaryStatus.description:
The status of the this calculated summary, limited to the following possible values: 

 valid 

 invalid 

 superseded

inputs.description: Object containing the inputs that were used in this calculation.

businessId.description:
An identifier for the business, unique to the customer. Must conform to the regular expression: 

 ^X[A-Z0-9]{1}IS[0-9]{11}$

typeOfBusiness.description:
The type of business the calculation summary is for. Limited to the following possible values:  

 foreign-property-fhl-eea 

 foreign-property

accountingPeriodStartDate.description: The date the accounting period started.

accountingPeriodEndDate.description: The date the accounting period ended.

source.description:
Specifies the source of the income data used in this calculation. Limited to the following possible values: 

 MTD-SA

submissionPeriods.description: Array containing the submission periods for the income source.

submissionId.description:
A reference to the unique identifier of the period. Must conform to the regular expression: 

 ^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[1-5][0-9a-f]{3}-[89ab][0-9a-f]{3}-[0-9a-f]{12}$

startDate.description: The date the accounting period started.

endDate.description: The date the accounting period ended.

receivedDateTime.description: The date and time data received .

adjustableSummaryCalculation.description: Object containing the details about foreign property summary calculation.

totalIncome.description: The total income for the income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

income.description: Object containing the fields that can be adjusted for foreign property income sources.

rentAmount.description: The total amount of property rental income. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

premiumsOfLeaseGrant.description: Premiums received for the grant of a lease and other lump sums to possess a property. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherPropertyIncome.description: Other income from property, such as rent charges and ground rents, income from letting others tip waste on your land, and income for the use of a caravan or houseboat at a fixed location. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99.

totalExpenses.description: The total expenses for the income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

expenses.description: Object containing the expenses for foreign property income sources.

consolidatedExpenses.description: Sum of all expenses for the specified period. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

premisesRunningCosts.description: Rent, rates, insurance, ground rents etc. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

repairsAndMaintenance.description: Property repairs and maintenance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

financialCosts.description: Loan interest and other financial costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

professionalFees.description: Legal, management and other professional fees. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

costOfServices.description: Cost of services provided, including wages. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

residentialFinancialCost.description: Captures residential financial cost that can be deductible from rental income (tax relief). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

broughtFwdResidentialFinancialCost.description: Amount of relief brought forward for restricted residential financial costs. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

other.description: Other allowable property expenses. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

travelCosts.description: Car, van and travel costs incurred in running a property business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netProfit.description: The net profit of income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

netLoss.description: The net loss of income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalAdditions.description: The total additions to net profit (or deduction to net loss). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

additions.description: Object containing the breakdown of the adjustable additions for the accounting period.

privateUseAdjustment.description: Private use adjustment on an asset by a sole trader or partner in a partnership, the asset is put in to a single-asset pool and allowances are restricted on the business to private-use ratio. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

balancingCharge.description: Balancing charge on sale or cessation of business use (where you have disposed of assets for more than their tax value). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

totalDeductions.description: The total deductions to net loss (or addition to net profit). The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

deductions.description: Object containing the deduction for foreign property income sources.

annualInvestmentAllowance.description: Annual investment allowance on items that qualify up to the AIA amount. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

costOfReplacingDomesticItems.description:
The amount for replacing domestic items such as: 

 Moveable furniture 

 Furnishings such as carpets, curtains and linen 

 Household appliances such as fridges and freezers 

 Kitchenware such as crockery and cutlery 

 Televisions. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

zeroEmissionGoods.description: Zero emission goods vehicle allowance for goods vehicles purchased for business use. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

propertyAllowance.description: The amount of property allowance income received. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

otherCapitalAllowance.description: Other capital allowances. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

electricChargePointAllowance.description: The expenditure incurred on electric charge-point equipment. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

structuredBuildingAllowance.description: The amount of enhanced structured building allowance.  The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

zeroEmissionsCarAllowance.description: The amount of zero emissions car allowance. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxableProfit.description: Amount of taxable net profit. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999 no decimal places.

adjustedIncomeTaxLoss.description: Amount of taxable net loss. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999 no decimal places.

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. This must be an ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 value.

totalIncome.description: The total income for the income source. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

income.description: Object containing the fields that can be adjusted for foreign property income sources.
